name: davidbs
text: Beef's powers of deduction rival Sherlock Holmes' when it comes to recycling.

name: chaesar
text: Didn't Estevez and Sheen do this in "Men at Work?"

name: tragicone
text: Chubby for a underrated movie.

name: chasanator
text: seconded!

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thedice, Vee, Jesus, lk)

name: whuppins
text: A comment left by whuppins was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Pseudochron, subtlet, gorrioncita)

name: mega_panda
text: notice how beef's pillow has indentations from his ears.

name: zefiel
text: Also Emeril wears earmuffs while his ears are on top of his head.

name: mugi
text: They're temple-warmers.

name: connellingus
text: I'm glad that Chris cleaned up Emeril's speech (see here and here ). I found him really hard to read in his early appearances, and making him more eloquent (even excessively so) and introducing the trashspotting angle made him a much more entertaining character.

name: slanger
text: "Draeger's" from panel 4 is a fancy pants grocery store.  Yeah I know, I know, "just butt out!"

name: molesticide
text:
you, sir, have been clicking on "you haven't seen these highest rated" in descending order.

i know this because i am doing the same thing, and only moments ago i read the philippe times in which he 'butts out' at the end.

name: geysershitdick
text:
A review of slanger's view history in his assetbar profile does corroborate this assessment

Excellent

clap clap clap clap clap

name: slanger
text: You guys are like Vincent D'Onofrio, all understanding my brain!  Although I feel I should mention that I'm a lady, not a dude.   So that part of the detective work didn't pan out, but that's cool.

name: pogo
text: You of course mean Det. Robert Goren, the fictional character played so well by Mr. D'Onofrio, (chubby for good spelling) who might be a complete yutz in real life, yet can memorize clever dialog like a master.

name: atticusonline
text: dang, they must have missed the lipstick on the butts

name: puguglypress
text:
Lipstick on my dong does corroborate

uh

so how bout them yankees

name: laserblade
text: Oh yeah, I just got the joke without even thinking about it, but I guess the vast majority of people in the world must not have Draeger's.

name: belgand
text: I had guessed that it was a brand rather than an upmarket store brand, but the point is still the same. I was unfamiliar with them because I live in the city and not the suburbs with Onstad. We do not know their pretensions to elegance here, but we do find it amusing. Such as a dog attempting to walk on it's hind legs.

name: afkpuz
text:
I didn't realize how much was going on in this strip until about the third go-round.

As to Emeril's dialogue, he appears to have seesawed back and forth from backwoods hillbilly to shakespearian english and now mixes both with our modern tongue to create a most satisfying blend.

name: laudabilis
text: Seconded. I had to read it, read the first comment, and read it again about four times.

name: lunchbox
text:
1) I miss hip-hop guys who dress like Spongebath

2) Nothing beats a big-ass salty turkey drumstick, all with a glazed, crunchy skin and salty pink meat.

name: rowboat
text: Spongebath is insane in the membrane. Also, he's too fat to walk.

name: professorhazard
text: Too fat, or too lazy?

name: rowboat
text: Too fat.

name: gazdatronik
text: Spongebath is not fat. if he were to stand on his hind legs, he would extremely tall compared to the others. I think he may suffer from uncorrected Acromegaly, which is what Andre the Giant had. He was growing his whole life, and near the end, his joints were too stressed for him to get around, and was in a wheelchair most of the time. Spongebath just garbagepicked a plus-size rascal from the Glendale area.

name: rowboat
text: Spongebath is not not fat.

name: tekende
text: One often begets the other.

name: lunchbox
text: Fatness is the ends, lack of exercise is the means, but that's neither here nor there.

name: pogo
text: It could also be a virus, I have read.

name: lunchbox
text: Nah, Spongebath don't make excuses for his dirty deeds.

name: tekende
text: It is kind of a loop. If you are fat, you are probably less likely to exert yourself toward any particular activity more stressful than changing the TV channel with the remote or pressing the buttons on the microwave.

name: lunchbox
text: I don't care about this conversation anymore. I am more fascinated by th fact that you and pogo have similar avatars, which is incredible.

name: storableprawn
text: The handface avatar is a thing.

name: deusoma
text: I like to think that Emeril pronounces the house number as "Eight thousand, two hundred and fifty-seven." It fits with him, somehow.

name: dasilodavi
text: This strip gets a five, not so much for humor, but for really fleshing out the world of Achewood.  Trashspotting really feels like a genuine activity, perhaps something my neighborhood's cats do when they root through the trash.

name: fablesandblues
text: I think it gets a 5 because of "Oh Hell and Damn Yes." Which is how I would respond to a still hot turkey drumstick.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Yes. Very sturdy V-chub (and a real one). You've spoken something which I feel has been missing in Achewood of late, description of slightly odd goings on, instead of slightly odd characters. I'd like to find out more about the rituals in the Achewood world.

dasilodavi you receive Assetbarrian of the month.

name: drskradley
text: "Trashspotting."  Also known as "group stalking."

name: unsentletter
text: Has Spongebath ever spoken?  I hope not... he's the Silent Bob of Achewood.

name: pogo
text: Crawling home after a night of pubs, I have often spotted trash and speculated on the lifestyle of the trashers, but this takes it to an artform.  Bravo.

name: gus
text: The turkey drumstick was warmed in a microwave. After it was found in a dumpster. I'd still eat it because I hope someday to be half as cool as Emeril and Spongebath.

name: desert_donkey
text: that would be so pimp to stroll around the neihborhood noshing on a turkey drumstick.

name: genequagmire
text: Sublime.

name: clovis
text: when did beef get back with Molly??

name: carlyle
text: Superb.

name: jar
text: I never considered having a turkey drumstick at 6 in the morning before, but boy it sure does sound hell of delicious.

name: jar
text: I never considered having a turkey drumstick at 6 in the morning before, but boy it sure does sound hell of delicious.

name: alm96
text: Is that a roofless golf cart or a 4 wheeled moped?

name: kingcrimson
text: I will always remember this strip as the place where I finally fell asleep after staying up all night to read through the archives for the first time

name: dcofosho224
text: i LOVE the chemistry between this trio right here. i also love how spongebath is always sitting down, even when he's ragin a Tenmen show.
